page.title: 16Womens Institutes in Upton.
page.content: Upton Upon Severn{Womens Institute hold a monthly meeting in the Memorial Hall the second Tuesday of the month at 7.30 pm. Earls Croome Womens Institute hold their monthly meeting in the Village Hall the second Tuesday of each month 7.30 pm. Upton and District Womens Institute Market hold a weekly{market}each Saturday 9 am to 12 noon in the Church room Old Street, Upton. The producers are members of Institutes from surrounding villages. Home produced items include cakes, pastries, bread, preserves, vegetables, plants and handicraft.
